ModMetaData.name: Spawning through egglayer for Mantodean insectoid race
ModMetaData.author: Urtrangar
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds an queen/egglayer for Mantodean race. Can be gotten in two ways: a) Get Mantodean egglayer at the start. Might be not easy, as they eat a lot and prefer animal products. b) Create an Egg at mantodean Jelly maker, or art spot. Will have to tame resulting queen/drone as it comes wild. After that will keep male/female spawners together if you want to get mantodean eggs or keep female separate to get more spawner eggs.
spawner has a cost of 500, so they might have an impact on colony wealth.
Replaces mantodean race file to remove a couple of "relative died/captured" thougts. As those seemed unfit for hive insects, and caused great drop of morale for large portion of the hive in case of losses.
